verses.verse: וַיֵּ֖דַע <S%H3045><s%> perceived יוֹאָ֣ב <S%H3097><s%> Now Joab בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son צְרֻיָ֑ה <S%H6870><s%> of Zeruiah כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for לֵ֥ב <S%H3820><s%> heart הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> that the king's עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> toward אַבְשָׁלֽוֹם׃ <S%H53><s%> [was] toward Absalom

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> sent יוֹאָב֙ <S%H3097><s%> And Joab תְּק֔וֹעָה <S%H8620><s%> to Tekoah וַיִּקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> and fetched מִשָּׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there אִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H802><s%> woman חֲכָמָ֑ה <S%H2450><s%> thence a wise וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֵ֠לֶיהָ <S%H413><s%> about הִֽתְאַבְּלִי־ <S%H56><s%> unto her I pray thee feign thyself to be a mourner נָ֞א <S%H4994><s%> to her Please וְלִבְשִׁי־ <S%H3847><s%> and put on נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> now בִגְדֵי־ <S%H899><s%> apparel אֵ֗בֶל <S%H60><s%> now mourning וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תָּס֙וּכִי֙ <S%H5480><s%> and anoint שֶׁ֔מֶן <S%H8081><s%> not thyself with oil וְהָיִ֕ית <S%H1961><s%> become כְּאִשָּׁ֗ה <S%H802><s%> but be as a woman זֶ֚ה <S%H2088><s%> he יָמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> time רַבִּ֔ים <S%H7227><s%> that had a long מִתְאַבֶּ֖לֶת <S%H56><s%> mourned עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for מֵֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> for the dead

וּבָאת֙ <S%H935><s%> And come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> to the king וְדִבַּ֥רְתְּ <S%H1696><s%> and speak אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> about כַּדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> on this manner הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this וַיָּ֧שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> put יוֹאָ֛ב <S%H3097><s%> unto him So Joab אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <S%H1697><s%> the words בְּפִֽיהָ׃ <S%H6310><s%> in her mouth

וַ֠תֹּאמֶר <S%H559><s%> spake הָאִשָּׁ֤ה <S%H802><s%> And when the woman הַתְּקֹעִית֙ <S%H8621><s%> of Tekoah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> to the king וַתִּפֹּ֧ל <S%H5307><s%> she fell עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on אַפֶּ֛יהָ <S%H639><s%> on her face אַ֖רְצָה <S%H776><s%> to the ground וַתִּשְׁתָּ֑חוּ <S%H7812><s%> and did obeisance וַתֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said הוֹשִׁ֥עָה <S%H3467><s%> Help הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> O king ס

וַיֹּֽאמֶר־ <S%H559><s%> said לָ֥הּ הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> to her What לָּ֑ךְ וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> unto her What aileth thee? And she answered אֲבָ֛ל <S%H61><s%> I [am] indeed אִשָּֽׁה־ <S%H802><s%> woman אַלְמָנָ֥ה <S%H490><s%> a widow אָ֖נִי <S%H589><s%> I וַיָּ֥מָת <S%H4191><s%> is dead אִישִֽׁי׃ <S%H376><s%> and mine husband

וּלְשִׁפְחָֽתְךָ֙ <S%H8198><s%> And thy handmaid שְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8147><s%> had two בָנִ֔ים <S%H1121><s%> sons וַיִּנָּצ֤וּ <S%H5327><s%> strove together שְׁנֵיהֶם֙ <S%H8147><s%> and they two בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> in the field וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> and there מַצִּ֖יל <S%H5337><s%> and [there was] none to part בֵּֽינֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H996><s%> among וַיַּכּ֧וֹ <S%H5221><s%> smote הָאֶחָ֛ד <S%H259><s%> them but the one אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> the other וַיָּ֥מֶת <S%H4191><s%> and slew אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%>

וְהִנֵּה֩ <S%H2009><s%> now behold קָ֨מָה <S%H6965><s%> is risen כָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole הַמִּשְׁפָּחָ֜ה <S%H4940><s%> And behold the whole family עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against שִׁפְחָתֶ֗ךָ <S%H8198><s%> against thine handmaid וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> and they said תְּנִ֣י ׀ <S%H5414><s%> Deliver אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַכֵּ֣ה <S%H5221><s%> him that smote אָחִ֗יו <S%H251><s%> his brother וּנְמִתֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H4191><s%> that we may kill בְּנֶ֤פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> him for the life אָחִיו֙ <S%H251><s%> of his brother אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whom הָרָ֔ג <S%H2026><s%> whom he slew וְנַשְׁמִ֖ידָה <S%H8045><s%> and we will destroy גַּ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> again אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיּוֹרֵ֑שׁ <S%H3423><s%> the heir וְכִבּ֗וּ <S%H3518><s%> also and so they shall quench אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גַּֽחַלְתִּי֙ <S%H1513><s%> my coal אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which נִשְׁאָ֔רָה <S%H7604><s%> and shall not leave לְבִלְתִּ֧י <S%H1115><s%> neither [שֹׂום־ כ] (שִׂים־ <S%H7760><s%> to leave לְאִישִׁ֛י <S%H7760><s%> which is left ק) שֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> [neither] name וּשְׁאֵרִ֖ית <S%H7611><s%> nor remainder עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> upon הָאֲדָמָֽה׃ <S%H127><s%> the earth פ

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָאִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> unto the woman לְכִ֣י <S%H1980><s%> Go לְבֵיתֵ֑ךְ <S%H1004><s%> to thine house וַאֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> and I אֲצַוֶּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> and I will give charge עָלָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H5921><s%> concerning

וַתֹּ֜אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הָאִשָּׁ֤ה <S%H802><s%> And the woman הַתְּקוֹעִית֙ <S%H8621><s%> of Tekoah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king עָלַ֞י <S%H5921><s%> and אֲדֹנִ֥י <S%H113><s%> My lord הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> O king הֶעָוֹ֖ן <S%H5771><s%> the iniquity וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house אָבִ֑י <S%H1><s%> [be] on me and on my father's וְהַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and the king וְכִסְא֖וֹ <S%H3678><s%> and his throne נָקִֽי׃ <S%H5355><s%> [be] guiltless ס

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king הַֽמְדַבֵּ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> Whosoever saith אֵלַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H413><s%> to you וַֽהֲבֵאת֣וֹ <S%H935><s%> [ought] unto thee bring אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> about וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יֹסִ֥יף <S%H3254><s%> thee any more ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> and he will not לָגַ֥עַת <S%H5060><s%> him to me and he shall not touch בָּֽךְ׃

וַתֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> Then said יִזְכָּר־ <S%H2142><s%> remember נָ֨א <S%H4994><s%> Please הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> she I pray thee let the king אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God [מֵהַרְבִית כ] (מֵהַרְבַּ֞ת <S%H7235><s%> abundance ק) גֹּאֵ֤ל <S%H1350><s%> that thou wouldest not suffer the revengers הַדָּם֙ <S%H1818><s%> of blood לְשַׁחֵ֔ת <S%H7843><s%> to destroy וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> otherwise יַשְׁמִ֖ידוּ <S%H8045><s%> lest they destroy אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנִ֑י <S%H1121><s%> my son וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> And he said חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> liveth יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> [As] the LORD אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo יִפֹּ֛ל <S%H5307><s%> fall מִשַּׂעֲרַ֥ת <S%H8185><s%> there shall not one hair בְּנֵ֖ךְ <S%H1121><s%> of thy son אָֽרְצָה׃ <S%H776><s%> to the earth

וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> said הָֽאִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> Then the woman תְּדַבֶּר־ <S%H1696><s%> I pray thee speak נָ֧א <S%H4994><s%> Please שִׁפְחָתְךָ֛ <S%H8198><s%> Let thine handmaid אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֲדֹנִ֥י <S%H113><s%> unto my lord הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king דָּבָ֑ר <S%H1697><s%> [one] word וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said דַּבֵּֽרִי׃ <S%H1696><s%> Say on ס

וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> said הָֽאִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> And the woman וְלָ֧מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why חָשַׁ֛בְתָּה <S%H2803><s%> Wherefore then hast thou thought כָּזֹ֖את <S%H2063><s%> likewise עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against עַ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> such a thing against the people אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> angels וּמִדַּבֵּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> doth speak הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> in that the king הַדָּבָ֤ר <S%H1697><s%> this thing הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> such כְּאָשֵׁ֔ם <S%H818><s%> as one which is faulty לְבִלְתִּ֛י <S%H1115><s%> does not הָשִׁ֥יב <S%H7725><s%> doth not fetch home again הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> נִדְּחֽוֹ׃ <S%H5080><s%> his banished

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מ֣וֹת <S%H4191><s%> For we must needs נָמ֔וּת <S%H4191><s%> die וְכַמַּ֙יִם֙ <S%H4325><s%> and [are] as water הַנִּגָּרִ֣ים <S%H5064><s%> spilt אַ֔רְצָה <S%H776><s%> on the ground אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> cannot יֵאָסֵ֑פוּ <S%H622><s%> which cannot be gathered up again וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> cannot יִשָּׂ֤א <S%H5375><s%> respect אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> neither doth God נֶ֔פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> [any] person וְחָשַׁב֙ <S%H2803><s%> yet doth he devise מַֽחֲשָׁב֔וֹת <S%H4284><s%> means לְבִלְתִּ֛י <S%H1115><s%> that יִדַּ֥ח <S%H5080><s%> that his banished מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at נִדָּֽח׃ <S%H5080><s%> be not expelled

וְ֠עַתָּה <S%H6258><s%> Now אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> the reason בָּ֜אתִי <S%H935><s%> Now therefore that I am come לְדַבֵּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> to speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַמֶּ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king אֲדֹנִי֙ <S%H113><s%> unto my lord אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> of this thing הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for יֵֽרְאֻ֖נִי <S%H3372><s%> have made me afraid הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> [it is] because the people וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שִׁפְחָֽתְךָ֙ <S%H8198><s%> and thy handmaid אֲדַבְּרָה־ <S%H1696><s%> I will now speak נָּ֣א <S%H4994><s%> now אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king אוּלַ֛י <S%H194><s%> perhaps יַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> will perform הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> it may be that the king אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּבַ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> the request אֲמָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H519><s%> of his handmaid

כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for יִשְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> will hear הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> For the king לְהַצִּ֥יל <S%H5337><s%> to deliver אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲמָת֖וֹ <S%H519><s%> his handmaid מִכַּ֣ף <S%H3709><s%> out of the hand הָאִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> of the man לְהַשְׁמִ֨יד <S%H8045><s%> [that would] destroy אֹתִ֤י <S%H853><s%> וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנִי֙ <S%H1121><s%> me and my son יַ֔חַד <S%H3162><s%> together מִֽנַּחֲלַ֖ת <S%H5159><s%> out of the inheritance אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> of God

וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> said שִׁפְחָ֣תְךָ֔ <S%H8198><s%> Then thine handmaid יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> become נָּ֛א <S%H4994><s%> Please דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> The word אֲדֹנִ֥י <S%H113><s%> of my lord הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king לִמְנוּחָ֑ה <S%H4496><s%> shall now be comfortable כִּ֣י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> for כְּמַלְאַ֣ךְ <S%H4397><s%> for as an angel הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> of God כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> so אֲדֹנִ֤י <S%H113><s%> so [is] my lord הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> the king לִשְׁמֹ֙עַ֙ <S%H8085><s%> to discern הַטּ֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> good וְהָרָ֔ע <S%H7451><s%> and bad וַֽיהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> therefore the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God יְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> become עִמָּֽךְ׃ <S%H5973><s%> with פ
